</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds a unit into the list of units available for [[Team_Switch|Team Switch]]. Units marked as [[playableUnits|playable]] in editor are automatically switchable.
This command allows to add non-playable unit into array of [[switchableUnits]] and make them available for [[teamSwitch]]. SP only. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[addSwitchableUnit]] unitName</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[addSwitchableUnit]] bob</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[teamSwitch]], [[removeSwitchableUnit]], [[switchableUnits]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
